article.title: Sechan to Provide Electronic Payload Interface Boxes
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sechan Electronics Incorporated, Lititz, Pennsylvania, is being awarded a $16,233,167 firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for up to 350 electronic payload interface boxes; one engineering development model; engineering services not to exceed $50,000; and an optional final technical data package in support of U.S. Marine Corps Ground Based Operation Surveillance Systems. Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane Division, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
